question: Anyone else diagnosed with gd? I am 35+1 and I had a growth scan Thursday and found out that baby is measuring a week behind. He has been measuring where he was supposed to alk through out pregnancy uo until now. We had a growth scan at 30 wks and he was in the 22% and measured at gestational age and estimated weight was 3.5 lbs. Then Thurs which is a mth later he was in the 6% and estimated weight was 4.9  lbs and was measuring at 33+4 instead of 34+4 so a wk behind.  Anyone else have this?
title: gestational diabetes and possible IUGR
